topic.title: Product introductions
topic.shortdesc: Name the ID in the following format: <product name>-introduction. For example: ks-introduction

body.p: Katalon Studio is a productive IDE for test case generation, with cross-platform execution.
Katalon TestOps is an enterprise-ready platform for QA Orchestration, test analytics, and reporting.
Katalon Recorder is a free, Selenium IDE alternative, lightweight web extension for automating actions and automated testing on the browser. Currently, we are available on Chrome, Firefox and Edge.
Katalon TestCloud is a cloud-based test execution environment equipped with the most common browsers and operating systems.
Katalon Studio Enterprise is an advanced, robust, and scalable solution for businesses of any size.
Katalon Runtime Engine is the test execution add-on of for executing and scheduling tests in CI/CD pipeline or via the command-line interface.
Katalium Framework is a framework that provides a blueprint for test automation projects based on TestNG and Selenium.
